downloadTitle: Azure IoT Edge for Linux on Windows (v1.0.0.0) - Public Preview
downloadDescription: Azure IoTEdge for Linux on Windows enables customers to run production Linux-based cloud-native workloads on Windows
detailsSection: Azure IoT Edge for Linux on Windows provides the ability to deploy Linux IoT Edge modules onto a Windows device. This opens a world of capabilities for commercial IoT as well as AI/ML with the availability of pre-built modules from the Azure Marketplace such as Live Video Analytics, SQL Edge, and OPC Publisher as a few examples. As a developer, you may also choose to implement your own custom modules using the Linux distribution of your choice to address specific business requirements. Running Linux modules on Windows becomes a seamless part of your solution.
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Windows Builds
  • Build 17763 or later
Supported Windows Editions
  • Windows 10 IoT Enterprise
  • Windows 10 Enterprise
  • Windows 10 Professional
  • Windows Server 2019 or later
Minimum Hardware Requirements
  • at least 2 GB free memory
  • 10 GB of free disk space
Other requirements
  • Azure Subscription
  • Azure IoT Hub
installInstructionSection: Please see Azure IoT Edge for Linux on Windows Documentation for detailed instructions. Subscribe to receive email announcements about Azure IoT Edge for Linux on Windows.
